rooms.description: A small entrance lobby with Vastu-aligned direction (east) to welcome positive energy and ensure good flow.

An open-plan living-dining-kitchen space designed for social interaction, blending kitchen and dining area seamlessly. The open layout supports natural ventilation and passive cooling, with ample windows on the south and west walls to enhance light.
A multipurpose room that can serve as a study or home office. It is located near the entrance for easy access while ensuring privacy through interior glass partitions.

openings.description: Main entry door aligned with Vastu, promoting auspicious energy.
Windows on the east wall to allow morning light and positive vibes.
A cross-ventilation system with openings on the south for effective air circulation.
